hero.headline: AI-Powered SaaS Insights
hero.title: Discover Profitable SaaS Ideas from Reddit Discussions
hero.subtitle: Leverage AI to analyze Reddit conversations, identify market gaps, and validate your SaaS business ideas with real user pain points and market insights.

benefits.headline: Benefits
benefits.title: Why Use SaaS Insights?
benefits.subtitle: Stop guessing what SaaS products to build. Our platform analyzes thousands of Reddit discussions to identify real market needs, validate your ideas, and provide actionable insights for launching successful SaaS businesses with confidence.

cards.title: AI-Powered Insights
cards.description: Advanced AI analyzes Reddit discussions to identify SaaS opportunities and market gaps

cards.title: Idea Validation
cards.description: Validate your SaaS concepts with real user pain points and market demand evidence

cards.title: Competitive Analysis
cards.description: Understand the competitive landscape and identify untapped market segments

cards.title: Implementation Roadmap
cards.description: Get actionable recommendations on how to build and launch your SaaS product
